text: Who's Sorry Now? may refer to: * "Who's Sorry Now?" (song), music written by Ted Snyder and lyrics by Bert Kalmar and Harry Ruby, covered by Connie Francis, Marie Osmond, Willie Nelson, and other artists * Who's Sorry Now (album), by Marie Osmond * Who's Sorry Now? (Babyland album), 1995 * Who's Sorry Now? (Connie Francis album), 1958
title: Who's Sorry Now?
